flavorText: "There are none alive that I cannot crush. There are none dead that I do not command."

foreignData.flavorText: „Alles, was lebt, kann ich zerquetschen. Alles, was tot ist, kann ich kontrollieren."
foreignData.name: Prinz der Knechte
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine bleibende Karte, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, auf den Friedhof gelegt wird, bringe diese Karte unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel zurück, falls dieser Gegner nicht 3 Lebenspunkte bezahlt.

foreignData.flavorText: "No hay nadie vivo que no pueda aplastar. No existe ningún muerto que no pueda dominar."
foreignData.name: Príncipe de los esclavos
foreignData.text: Siempre que un permanente que controle un oponente vaya a un cementerio, pon esa carta en juego bajo tu control a menos que ese oponente pague 3 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il n'y a aucun vivant que je ne puisse écraser. Il n'y a aucun mort que je ne puisse commander. »
foreignData.name: Prince des serviteurs
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'un permanent qu'un adversaire contrôle est mis dans un cimetière, mettez en jeu cette carte sous votre contrôle à moins que cet adversaire ne paie 3 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non c'è nessuno vivo che io non possa annientare. Non c'è nessuno morto che io non comandi."
foreignData.name: Principe degli Schiavi
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta un permanente controllato da un avversario viene messo in un cimitero, metti in gioco quella carta sotto il tuo controllo a meno che quell'avversario non paghi 3 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我に踏み潰せぬもの生者の中に無し。 我の命じを拒めるもの死者の中に無し。」
foreignData.name: 束縛の皇子
foreignData.text: いずれかの対戦相手がコントロールするパーマネントが１ついずれかの墓地に置かれるたび、その対戦相手が３点のライフを支払わないかぎり、そのカードをあなたのコントロール下で場に出す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

foreignData.flavorText: "Não há ninguém entre os vivos que eu não possa esmagar. Não há ninguém entre os mortos que eu não possa comandar."
foreignData.name: Príncipe dos Servos
foreignData.text: Toda vez que uma permanente que um oponente controla é colocada num cemitério, coloque aquele card em jogo sob o seu controle, a menos que aquele oponente pague 3 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: «Нет живых, которых я не мог бы сокрушить. Нет мертвых, над которыми я был бы не властен».
foreignData.name: Князь Порабощенных
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда перманент под контролем оппонента попадает на кладбище, положите ту карту в игру под вашим контролем, если только тот оппонент не заплатит 3 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText: 「所有活物都任我宰割。 所有死物均听我号令。」
foreignData.name: 尸奴王子
foreignData.text: 每当一个由对手操控的永久物置入坟墓场时，除非该对手支付3点生命，否则将该牌在你的操控下放置进场。

name: Prince of Thralls
originalText: Whenever a permanent an opponent controls is put into a graveyard, put that card into play under your control unless that opponent pays 3 life.

rulings.text: It doesn’t matter whose graveyard the permanent is put into as long as an opponent controlled it when it last existed on the battlefield.
If the ability triggers and your opponent chooses not to pay 3 life, you must return the card to the battlefield, even if you don’t want to.

If the permanent that caused the ability to trigger leaves the graveyard before the ability resolves (because it’s a token and it ceased to exist, or because a spell or ability removed it from the graveyard), the ability will still resolve. The opponent will have the option to pay 3 life. But whether or not that player pays the life, nothing will be returned to the battlefield.

text: Whenever a permanent an opponent controls is put into a graveyard, put that card onto the battlefield under your control unless that opponent pays 3 life.
